tasks.title: Set Up Home Route and Component Structure
tasks.description: Create the main dashboard route and component structure for the home page.
tasks.details: Create a new route in `app/routes/home.tsx` and a main component in `app/features/home/screens/home-dashboard.tsx`. Ensure the route is correctly integrated into the existing routing strategy.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the route loads without errors and the component renders a basic layout.

tasks.title: Implement Navigation Bar Integration
tasks.description: Ensure the existing navigation bar integrates seamlessly with the new home structure.
tasks.details: Maintain the current navigation bar layout and links (Home, Create, Explore, Profile). Ensure it is compatible with the new home page structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that the navigation bar displays correctly and links navigate to the correct pages.

tasks.title: Develop Hero Section
tasks.description: Create a static hero section as a placeholder for future dynamic content.
tasks.details: Implement a simple banner with a title, subtitle, and CTA button using a gray box or gradient as a placeholder.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure the hero section displays correctly with placeholder content.

tasks.title: Create 'My Characters' and 'Recent Chats' Sections
tasks.description: Develop sections for displaying user's characters and recent chats with data fetching.
tasks.details: Fetch user's characters and recent chat rooms using `creator_id = user.id` and sort chats by `last_message_at`. Implement horizontal scroll or grid layout for displaying items.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate that the correct data is fetched and displayed in the specified layout.

tasks.title: Implement Discovery/Popular Section
tasks.description: Develop a section for exploring public characters based on popularity and recency.
tasks.details: Fetch popular characters sorted by `like_count` or `chat_count` and new characters by `created_at`. Use a responsive grid layout for display.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that the section displays characters correctly and updates based on sorting criteria.

tasks.title: Add Category Filter Functionality
tasks.description: Implement category filtering for characters using pill-shaped buttons.
tasks.details: Create filter buttons for categories like 'All', 'Romance', 'Fantasy'. Implement filtering logic to update displayed characters based on selected category.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure that selecting a category updates the displayed characters accordingly.

tasks.title: Optimize Data Fetching with Parallel Requests
tasks.description: Enhance data fetching performance using parallel requests.
tasks.details: Use `Promise.all` in the `loader` function to fetch user's characters, recent chats, and popular characters simultaneously. Limit results to improve performance.
tasks.testStrategy: Monitor network requests to ensure they are executed in parallel and verify data integrity.

tasks.title: Refactor and Reuse UI Components
tasks.description: Refactor existing components for reuse in the new dashboard.
tasks.details: Refactor `CharacterCard` for reuse if necessary. Create a `SectionLayout` component for consistent section headers with a title and 'See All' link.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that components are reused correctly and maintain consistent styling across sections.

tasks.title: Ensure Layout Matches Figma Design
tasks.description: Align the dashboard layout with the Figma design specifications.
tasks.details: Adjust CSS and component structure to ensure the layout closely matches the Figma design (Node 27:3404).
tasks.testStrategy: Compare the rendered layout with the Figma design to ensure alignment.

tasks.title: Conduct Error Handling and Success Metrics Validation
tasks.description: Implement error handling and validate success metrics for the dashboard.
tasks.details: Ensure no '400 Bad Request' or '500' errors occur during data fetching. Validate that logged-in users see their content at the top.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform tests to trigger potential errors and verify that success metrics are met.
